item.title: How do i make an admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

a quick way to fix that make shure you go threw your client.java and search for thingls like …

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("
thing like that thoes are quick back doors to your server i know because i do that all the time to my sources.
but to make it so you are all ways a admin search for
bankItemsN = loadgame.bankItemsN;
playerLevel = loadgame.playerLevel;
playerXP = loadgame.playerXP;
that is the way it is for myn and after the two }'s hit enter and add in …
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your username goes here.”) && playerPass.equalsIgnoreCase(“password goes here”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

item.title: How do i make an admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

Well, I’ll answer the Topic Name.
Go to your Server Source > Click on the Folder ‘Characters’ > Ctrl + F to find the persons name > Double click on there name > Change Player Rights to 3 > Save > Compile > Run.

Thanks

Read full topic
